* Stage I/II with nonpCR OR stage III (pCR or not) to be enrolled <90 days from completion of HP/TDM1

* TWO cohorts depending on HLA-A*02

* Low affinity CD16A Genotype FF or FV (Prior to enrollment) from germline PBMNs

Eligibility:
* Stage IIB / III HER2+ Breast cancer receiving NACT. Stage IIA has to have 1ry > 15mm

* Low affinity CD16A Genotype FF or FV (Prior to enrollment) from germline PBMNs
TNM Staging: T2 N1, T2 N2, T3 N1, T3 N2

Eligibility:
* Prior NACT with 6 or more cycles of chemo (at least 9 weeks or THP). If was part of EA1181, must receive 2 more cycles of chemo

* ER+ must be ypN+ (1/2/3) with ypT1/2/3. Weak ER+ can be ypN0. Will be randomized to TDM1 vs TDM1 and Tucatinib. May receive 1 cycle adjuvant T-DM1 prior to registration

* Prior NACT with 6 or more cycles of chemo (at least 9 weeks or THP). If was part of EA1181, must receive 2 more cycles of chemo

* ER- can be ypT1/2/3 with ypN0/1/2/3. Will be randomized to TDM1 vs TDM1 and Tucatinib. May receive 1 cycle adjuvant T-DM1 prior to registration

* ADH, ALH, LCIS or DCIS requiring excision. T1(mi) is allowed. If undergoing germline testing, results should be available prior to randomization

* Ruxo vs Placebo for 15 days +/- 5 days. Surgery within 12 hours of last dose
TNM Staging: T1(mi)

1) Clinical T2 or T3 and N0 or N1 with Grade I and II

1) Progression on 1st Line CDK4/6. ESR1 mutation

Eligibility:
* Post 1st Line of ET/CDK either Denovo or relapse after 2 years (min) of ET therapy

* Part A three arm for OP 120, OP 90 and SoC. Part B is OP vs SoC [Faslo or AI]

* Part A three arm for OP 120, OP 90 and SoC. Part B is OP vs SoC [Faslo or AI]

Eligibility:
* Intermediate and High risk to randomize between adjuvant year 2 : 5 to either continue adj. ET SoC vs oral SERD

* Intermediate: T3 N0 | T1c/T2 N1 [2-3 LN] | T1c/T2 N0 (Grade III, KI67 >= 20%, LumB/RS26, or prior chemotherapy)

* High: Stage III | T1c/T2 N1 [2-3] (Grade III, KI67 >= 20%, LumB/RS26) | T1c/T2 N1 [1/3] (Grade III, KI67 >= 20%, LumB/RS26)
